org.opentcs.util.event

Interface EventBus

  • All Superinterfaces:
    EventHandler, EventSource
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    SimpleEventBus

    public interface EventBus
extends EventHandler, EventSource
    A distributor of events. Forwards events received via EventHandler.onEvent(java.lang.Object) to all subscribed handlers.

    • Method Summary

      • Methods inherited from interface org.opentcs.util.event.EventHandler

        onEvent

      • Methods inherited from interface org.opentcs.util.event.EventSource

        subscribe, unsubscribe
